units.name: Zhi: Captain of the Delta-Frigate, Revenant

actions.name: Lock On
actions.description: Type: Action. If successful,choose an enemy figure within medium range and assign it one 'Marked' token.

actions.name: Silent Death
actions.description: Type: Attack. Range: Medium to Long.

actions.name: Smoke Grenade
actions.description: Type: Action. Range: Short. Duration: 3 rounds. Effect: Blocks line of sight through and in the range of effect.

actions.name: Breach Security
actions.description: Type: Action. Range: Contact. Effect: For each success, open one door.

upgrades.name: Hightened Vigor
upgrades.description: Limit one per unit. Increases unit Health by 1.

upgrades.name: Endurance Boost
upgrades.description: Limit one per unit. Increases unit Stamina by 1.

upgrades.name: Fierce Strength
upgrades.description: Limit one per unit. Increases unit Might by 1.

upgrades.name: Cloak and Dagger
upgrades.description: Limit one per unit. Increases unit Cunning by 1.

upgrades.name: Eidetic Memory
upgrades.description: Limit one per unit. Increases unit Intellect by 2.

phaseOne.name: Movement Resolution
phaseOne.description: Unit Movement is resolved in order of highest to lowest speed. In the case of a tie, the player with initiative moves their unit first. Their are three types of movement: Natural, Swift, and Cautious Movement.
phaseOne.noise: Both Natural and Swift Movement can cause AI to go into the Alert or even the Lock-Down states.

phaseOne.name: Natural Movement
phaseOne.description: Allows a unit to move up to its full movement value.
phaseOne.noise: Natural Movement puts all AI within 6 inches on Alert.

phaseOne.name: Cautious Movement
phaseOne.description: A unit ultilizing a cautious move may not exceed half of its' movement value.
phaseOne.noise: Cautious movement does not put AI on alert unless the AI has line of sight to the unit.

phaseOne.name: Swift Movement
phaseOne.description: Costs 2 Stamina. Allows a unit to move up to one and a half times its' movement, rounded up.
phaseOne.noise: Swift movement puts all AI within 6 inches on Lock-Down, and all units within 10 inches on Alert.

phaseTwo.name: Action Resolution
phaseTwo.description: Actions are resolved in order beginning with the unit that has the highest skill value. In the case of a tie, the player with priority resolves first.

phaseThree.name: Round End
phaseThree.description: Once all units have moved and/or taken their actions, the round ends. At this point each player checks to see if any objectives have been completed, and resolves any status effects inflicted on their units. If a player completes all of their objectives, the game is over. In the case where multiple players complete all of their objectives in the same round, the winner is the player with the highest victory points.
